name: PSYC 167
title: Clinical Psychology
description: Serves as an in-depth introduction to the field of clinical psychology. Covers issues of clinical assessment, interviewing, testing, and a range of therapeutic modalities.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): PSYC 100; previous or concurrent enrollment in PSYC 170. Enrollment is restricted to psychology majors.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section
